Project 1.title: Atlas Mobile for iOS
Project 1.description: For my undergraduate research project, I developed this iOS application for UCSF to track the longitudinal pain scores of patients. Written in Swift 5 and Xcode 11.0

Project 2.title: Sticker Studio for macOS
Project 2.description: A native macOS app to create stickers and easily access them using hotkeys. Written in Swift 5.

Project 3.title: Idea Swipe for iOS
Project 3.description: Share and save ideas in a Tinder-esque interface. This project won third place at the Congressional App Challenge in 2017.

Project 4.title: PocketTable for macOS
Project 4.description: A Periodic table accessible from your macOS Menu Bar. Made to scratch my own itch when taking chemistry. Written in pure Swift.
